subject: Playoff Games
Football
Super Bowl
Statistics
lead_paragraph: The top seeds in the A.F.C. and the N.F.C. — the New England Patriots and the Green Bay Packers — had, statistically, the worst defenses in the N.F.L. in the regular season.
snippet: The top seeds in the A.F.C. and the N.F.C. — the New England Patriots and the Green Bay Packers — had, statistically, the worst defenses in the N.F.L. in the regular season.
